title: Tommy Hilfiger, Fullstack Engineer
summary: For Tommy Hilfiger I worked as a full-stack JavaScript engineer on their loyalty app MyTommy. The app is built in React Native for both iPhone and Android, with a restful Node/Express API on the backend.
